page.title: 14Baldwinhome
page.content: This small hamlet lies 1\ miles SW of Great Orton. It is just on the edge of our block,two of the children taking part in the survey live here. the largest house is Linden House which is about 150 years old and is made of sandstone. It used to be a kennels but they have now closed. Opposite Lindin House are 2 bungalows about 11 years old. 4 other bungalows are 20-22 years old and are made of brick. Linden Farm is about 300 years old as are the other 2 farms. The last farm has been farmed for 30 years. All the farm have cattle, sheeep and poultry. Silage is the main crop with some barley. Local fields are named; Paradise, Spring, Broadbush, Weldale, Low Meadows, Shaw Bank and Peewit Park. The population is 38.Other jobs are drivers, merchant seaman & TV senior engineer. A Roman altar was found in Cardewless Field.
